title: Data Source
content: Set the data source of the menu through the data attribute. In addition, you can set whether the node can be selected through disabled in the data object.
findIntroStr: LinkMenu favorites menu, which supports configurable menu items.

title: Collection Menu Title
content: The title attribute defines the title of the favorites menu.
findIntroStr: LinkMenu favorites menu, which supports configurable menu items.

title: The menu content is displayed in a new line when it is too long.
content: The wrap attribute is used to set the menu content to be displayed in a line wrap when the menu content is too long.
findIntroStr: LinkMenu favorites menu, which supports configurable menu items.

title: Number of categories that can be added to favorites
content: The max-item attribute specifies the number of categories that can be selected and added to favorites. If default-expand-all is set to false, all nodes are collapsed when a menu pop-up window is opened.
findIntroStr: LinkMenu favorites menu, which supports configurable menu items.

title: Customized menu data service
findIntroStr: LinkMenu favorites menu, which supports configurable menu items.

title: Customize the folding and unfolding icon
content: Customize the expansion icon through the icon attribute. Use the search-icon attribute to customize the search icon.
findIntroStr: LinkMenu favorites menu, which supports configurable menu items.

title: Omitted if the menu content is too long.
content: You can set the ellipsis attribute to omit the display when the menu content is too long.
findIntroStr: LinkMenu favorites menu, which supports configurable menu items.

title: Customize the bottom of the pop-up window
content: Customize the bottom of the menu pop-up window through the foot slot. The sureNodevalue method is used to obtain the selected menu node, close the menu pop-up window, and display the selected menu. The hideDialog method is used to close a pop-up window. Slots can be used in combination with both methods.
findIntroStr: LinkMenu favorites menu, which supports configurable menu items.
